overview: When the ten muscular, horse hung European studs in Horsemen aren’t working on the ranch, they’re riding ass. Johan and Luc are out for a ride in the country when they take a break; Johan feasts on Luc’s muscular ass before mounting him until they both spew a river of sperm in the grass. Ripped Daniel props himself up on a fence while his buddy, hard-bodied David, sucks Daniel’s horse cock before Daniel pile drives David’s ass. In the last scene, tight-bodied Boris, rugged Joseph and muscular Micky get horny as hell cleaning out the stables, so the guys decide to drain each other’s nuts and fuck in the hay. Ride ‘em, cowboy!
title: Horsemen
